sentences.sentence: I, the humblest of thy servants, presume to teach thee?
sentences.translation: 我是您最卑微的仆人，怎么敢教您呢？

sentences.sentence: But genre painting, especially when it portrayed members of the humblest classes, was never popular in eighteenth-century France.
sentences.translation: 但在18世纪的法国，风俗画，尤其是描绘最卑微阶层的绘画，从来都不受欢迎。

sentences.sentence: At that last crossroad where thought hesitates, many men have arrived and even some of the humblest. They then abdicated what was most precious to them, their life.
sentences.translation: 许多人，甚至一些最为谦卑的人，都到达了思想停滞不前的最后岔路口，然后他们沉迷了，沉迷于他们自身和人生中最为珍贵的事情中。
